full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BLA TSE 'BOS PA'I 'CHI MED TSE BYIN GSER GYI RDO RJE ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , *, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI SGO NAS TSE 'GUGS BYED TSUL 'KHYER BDE BZHUGS SO, , *, ,BLA TSE 'BOS PA'I 'CHI MED TSE BYIN GSER GYI RDO RJE ZHES BYA BA NI,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI 'GRO BA MANG PO LA PHAN PA'I PHYIR, TSE CHOG DANG DPE CHA MANG PO NAS MDOR BSDUS TE, NGAG DBANG DGE LEGS SBYAR BA'O, ,DGE 'DIS TSE RING ZHING BDE BA CAN DU SKYE BAR SHOG , ,,BKRA SHIS, ,)
